description:
Tencent Weibo is committed to helping users to keep up with the latest news, share life with photos & texts anytime, follow friends’ life moments and interactive with them at all times; exclusive apps such as Fresh Show and Picture Vote are also available for them to create rich, practical social platforms.

Home: You can browse the information here in groups and subscribe to those premium channels; express your appreciation by just clicking “like”.

Discover: Hot Events helps to grasp every hottest news; Exclusive Apps, including Fresh Show, Picture Vote, Mito, Daily Tasks & Blow are waiting for you here; unlimited Wonderful Channels offer all sorts of contents; LBS find interesting nearby.

Personalized Setting: Switch your personalized cover as you like; QR name card represents your unique identity in Tencent Weibo, and blacklist those harassment information. 

In sum, Tencent Weibo is your most loyal companion who can help you to find wonders and magic in the world!
releaseNotes:
1)Fully updated for iOS8
2)Bug fixes

Thanks for using Tencent WeiBo,To make our app better for you,we bring updates to the App Store frequently. If you have iOS7 or up,you can update the app automatically by going to 
『Settings』->『iTunes Store&App Store』->『Automatic Downloads』and turning on 『Updates』
